con:soapui-project.name: BaaS_Automation

con:settings.con:setting: <xml-fragment xmlns:con="http://eviware.com/soapui/config"> <con:entry key="Environment" value="Default"/> <con:entry key="Global Properties" value=""/> <con:entry key="TestSuite" value="Common_SoapUI_Suite"/> <con:entry key="Password" value=""/> <con:entry key="TestRunner Path" value="C:\Program Files\SmartBear\SoapUI-5.2.0\bin"/> <con:entry key="Tool Args" value=""/> <con:entry key="Ignore Errors" value="true"/> <con:entry key="Host:Port" value=""/> <con:entry key="user-settings.xml Password" value=""/> <con:entry key="WSS Password Type" value=""/> <con:entry key="Save Project" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Enable UI" value="false"/> <con:entry key="System Properties" value=""/> <con:entry key="Domain" value=""/> <con:entry key="Coverage Report" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Export JUnit Results" value="true"/> <con:entry key="Export JUnit Results with test properties" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Open Report" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Project Properties" value=""/> <con:entry key="Export All" value="true"/> <con:entry key="Project Password" value=""/> <con:entry key="Report Format(s)" value=""/> <con:entry key="TestCase" value="<all>"/> <con:entry key="Print Report" value="true"/> <con:entry key="Username" value=""/> <con:entry key="Root Folder" value="C:\Program Files\SmartBear\SoapUI-5.2.0\bin\ext"/> <con:entry key="Select Report Type" value=""/> <con:entry key="Save After" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Add Settings" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Endpoint" value=""/> </xml-fragment>

con:soapui-project.con:afterLoadScript:
log.info "Global properties are loading"
Properties properties = new Properties() File propertiesFile = new File(context.expand('${#Global#property_file}')) propertiesFile.withInputStream { properties.load(it) }
com.eviware.soapui.model.propertyexpansion.PropertyExpansionUtils.globalProperties.setPropertyValue('baas_endpoint', properties.BAAS_SERVER) com.eviware.soapui.model.propertyexpansion.PropertyExpansionUtils.globalProperties.setPropertyValue('talend_endpoint', properties.TALEND_SERVER) com.eviware.soapui.model.propertyexpansion.PropertyExpansionUtils.globalProperties.setPropertyValue('vuconnect_endpoint', properties.VUCONNECT_SERVER) com.eviware.soapui.model.propertyexpansion.PropertyExpansionUtils.globalProperties.setPropertyValue('is_mail_sent', properties.IS_MAIL_SENT) com.eviware.soapui.model.propertyexpansion.PropertyExpansionUtils.globalProperties.setPropertyValue('input_path', properties.INPUT_FILE) com.eviware.soapui.model.propertyexpansion.PropertyExpansionUtils.globalProperties.setPropertyValue('output_path', properties.OUTPUT_FILE) com.eviware.soapui.model.propertyexpansion.PropertyExpansionUtils.globalProperties.setPropertyValue('log_api_timeout', properties.LOG_TIMEOUT) com.eviware.soapui.model.propertyexpansion.PropertyExpansionUtils.globalProperties.setPropertyValue('db_update_timeout', properties.DB_TIMEOUT)
log.info "Global properties are loaded"
